message: I'm offering you a great deal on this product for $100. It's a fantastic opportunity to try out a new item at a low price. I'm confident you'll love it!
I'll take a chance on this product, thank you!

I'll take another chance, hoping this one is better!

I'm not sure if it's worth the risk, considering it's worn out. I'll pass this one.

I completely understand your concerns last time, but I assure you this one is a completely different story. This product is brand new, still in its packaging, and has all the original documentation. Just keep in mind that it's not a top-of-the-line item.
